content:
So you know about bitcoin NFTs and ordinals, so I want you to explain me how we can get same results while there are no smart contract on bitcoin but we can integrate some code into an ordinal, the result is same as previously but with NFC and Ordinals:

I want you to detail me how we can couple the NFT and the NFC chip, with concrete explanations, to be sure the physical piece of our brand is authentic and verifiable on our own platform
